Package org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.ambassador.simulation.perception

Class CentralPerceptionComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.ambassador.simulation.perception.CentralPerceptionComponent
  • public class CentralPerceptionComponent
extends Object
    The CentralPerceptionComponent is responsible for keeping a spatial index of all vehicles, which allows fast querying of nearby vehicles.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CentralPerceptionComponent​(CPerception perceptionConfiguration)

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addTrafficLightGroup​(TrafficLightGroup trafficLightGroup)
      Adds traffic lights to the spatial index, as their positions are static it is sufficient to store positional information only once.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CentralPerceptionComponent

        public CentralPerceptionComponent​(CPerception perceptionConfiguration)

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
                throws InternalFederateException
        Initializes the spatial index used for perception.
        Throws:
        InternalFederateException - if perception backend wasn't properly defined

      • getTrafficObjectIndex

        public TrafficObjectIndex getTrafficObjectIndex()
        Returns the TrafficObjectIndex storing all vehicles.

      • getScenarioBounds

        public CartesianRectangle getScenarioBounds()

      • updateSpatialIndices

        public void updateSpatialIndices()
        Updates the spatial indices (currently only vehicles). If the positions of vehicles have not changed since last call of this method, nothing is done.

      • registerVehicleType

        public void registerVehicleType​(String vehicleId,
                                VehicleType vehicleType)
        Registers a vehicle and stores its corresponding vehicle type by name. This is required to extract vehicle dimensions.
        Parameters:
        vehicleId - id of the vehicle to register
        vehicleType - the vehicle type of the vehicle

      • updateVehicles

        public void updateVehicles​(VehicleUpdates vehicleUpdates)
        Store new updates of all Vehicles to be used in the next update of the spatial index.
        Parameters:
        vehicleUpdates - the interaction holding all vehicle updates

      • addTrafficLightGroup

        public void addTrafficLightGroup​(TrafficLightGroup trafficLightGroup)
        Adds traffic lights to the spatial index, as their positions are static it is sufficient to store positional information only once.
        Parameters:
        trafficLightGroup - the registered traffic light group interaction

      • updateTrafficLights

        public void updateTrafficLights​(TrafficLightUpdates trafficLightUpdates)
        Updates the traffic light index in regard to traffic lights. The unit simulator has to be queried as TrafficLightUpdates do not contain all necessary information.
        Parameters:
        trafficLightUpdates - a list of information packages transmitted by the traffic simulator
